name: Bangkok 48th International Conference on “ Business, Economics, Social Science & Humanities- BESSH-2017”
content: ‘’ Advances in collaborative research for Business , Economics, Social Sciences and Humanities ‘’ The conference will cover vital issues in Business, Economics , Social Sciences and Humanities under multiple sub-themes. The aim of our conference is to support, encourage and provide a platform for networking, sharing, publishing and nurturing the potential growth of individual scholars across the globe. CONFERENCE DATE: August 21-22, 2017 CONFERENCE VENUE: Holliday Inn Bangkok Silom Bangkok, Thailand Submission Email: bks487@academicfora.com ISBN : 978-969-683-718-3 IMPORTANT DATES: Abstract Submission Date: July 15, 2017 Notification of Acceptance / Rejection: With in one week of submission time Full Paper Submission:August 13, 2017 Early Bird Registration :June 10, 2017
